LUE
  • Releases

Releases

0.3.7

  • Full list of closed issues on Github

0.3.6

  • New operations: kinematic_wave, unique_id zonal_area, zonal_average, zonal_diversity, zonal_majority, zonal_maximum, zonal_minimum, zonal_normal, zonal_uniform.

  • Add lue.pcraster package to ease porting PCRaster models to LUE.

  • Add LUE_BUILD_QA target with support for quality assurance.

  • No need to construct numpy.dtype instances explicitly anymore. Operations accepting a numpy.dtype now also accept Numpy scalar type (e.g. numpy.float64).

  • Full list of closed issues on Github
